name: Puzzle by Nikoli V Sudoku
description:
With the Nikoli puzzle series, you can enjoy high-quality 'Sudoku' puzzles, created by Nikoli, who gave the world-famous puzzle its name.
'Puzzle by Nikoli V Sudoku' contains 50 sudoku puzzles. 'Sudoku' is a puzzle in which you place numbers from 1 to 9 into a 9x9 grid, divided into horizontal and vertical lines and 3x3 blocks, filling up all of the spaces with the numbers. With everything from simple puzzles to super-difficult ones, this game is popular with a wide range of players, from beginners to veterans. To ensure your long-term enjoyment, we're prepared both a 'Stage Clear' mode and a 'Random' mode. In 'Stage Clear' mode, you progress by clearing puzzles one by one, and in 'Random' mode puzzles are generated at random. Please enjoy this high-quality 'Sudoku' game.

1 player(s)
708KB Minimum
Touchscreen
